I just sold my Cubs subset to a Cubs enthusiast but was missing this card so part of the deal was that I would source it for him.  Looking to buy in the $200 price range.  

You can contact me at [url]h8ful21@yahoo.com[/url] with a scan and your price.

Thanks, Eric
I have this nice PSA 2 Front of card shows Very Good to Excellent back has some issues. $140.00 shipped Thanks Daryl [url]bafraley@msn.com[/url]
